title.part2: I Develop Cool & User-Friendly Web Services That Help Businesses Grow.

content.1: My name is Jesse Wei. I am a trilingual (Chinese, English and Japanese) designer and developer currently based in Japan.
content.2: I have over 7 years of experience in multiple design areas with a focus on UI/UX design. I am also experienced in development, particularly frontend development. Being able to design AND develop helps me understand a project better and thus create a more usable and manageable solution.
